title: Lead Me To Calvary
author: Jennie Evelyn Hussey (1874-1958)
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c v4 c v5 c

v1: King of my life, I crown Thee now,
Lest I forget Thy thorn-crowned brow,
v2: Show me the tomb where Thou wast laid,
Angels in robes of light arrayed
v3: Let me like Mary, through the gloom,
Come with a gift to Thee;
Show to me now the empty tomb,
v4: May I be willing, Lord, to bear
Even Thy cup of grief to share,
Thou hast borne all for me.
v5: Fill me, O Lord, with Thy desire
For all that know not Thee;
Then touch my lips with holy fire,
c1: Lest I forget Thy love for me,
